trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Mishawaka
There was one other sighting in Mishawaka on or around September 29th 2012
Summary: 20 or so bright red starlike orbs slowly floating and dancing from left to right until they ascended out of sigh...ttranfixing.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving work around dusk and saw dozens of red star sized objects floating above me and slightly to the west. They danced slowly and floated amongst one another as the sailed up until they were out of sight. They occasionally moved between one another horizontally. My reaction was a daze and I got very shaky afterwards because it was so strange. It was still kind of light out and was to the north of a very busy shopping area. I haven't heard any other witnesses.
